channel.title: Productivity on Bitperi(Periklis Gkolias)
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Bitperi(Periklis Gkolias)

item.title: The Definite Guide to Pick the Correct Music While Working
item.description: I only know few semi-god-concentration-giants who don’t work with headphones, while being productive at their company’s -usually noisy- office and I really admire them. For the rest of us co-mortals, we need our headphones/earphones, to make it through. But have you ever thought, what should you listen to, at work? And I mean, in terms of best value regarding your current state. Below are some hints, about how you should pick the sound that will entertain your ears.
